entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 35 this morning and minus 30 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light near midnight. Low minus 24. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 29 January 2023
